bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XLII. Egypt II. Published by Tiziano DORANDI.
bibl.note: Ch.L.A. XLII, 1207-1239. - 1207-1238: Cairo, The Egyptian Museum [seconda parte]; - 1239: Cairo, Institut Français d'Archéologie Orientale.
BRUCKNER Albert † and Robert MARICHAL, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XLII. Egypt II. Published by Tiziano DORANDI.
Dietikon - Zürich, Urs Graf Verlag, 1994, in fol., vi-90 pp., ill. ISBN 3-85951-175-0.
